title: Wilderness sword 2

properties.name: description
properties.value: The wilderness sword 2 is an Achievement Diary reward for completing the medium Wilderness Diary given by the Lesser Fanatic in Edgeville and can be reclaimed from him for free if lost.

The wilderness sword 2 is an Achievement Diary reward for completing the medium Wilderness Diary given by the Lesser Fanatic in Edgeville and can be reclaimed from him for free if lost.

Its stats are identical to a steel sword.

 Attack bonuses
+11+8-2+0+0
 Defence bonuses
+0+2+1+0+0
 Other bonusesSlot

square

Contents

  • 1 Combat styles
  • 2 Benefits
    • 2.1 From Wilderness sword 1
    • 2.2 Wilderness sword 2 only

Combat styles[edit | edit source]

Stab Sword
Combat OptionsCombat StyleStyle typeWeapon StyleExperienceInvisible Boost
StabStabAccurateAttack and Hitpoints+3 Attack
LungeStabAggressiveStrength and Hitpoints+3 Strength
SlashSlashAggressiveStrength and Hitpoints+3 Strength
BlockStabDefensiveDefence and Hitpoints+3 Defence

Benefits[edit | edit source]

From Wilderness sword 1[edit | edit source]

  • Wilderness lever will teleport to either Edgeville or Ardougne
  • Webs will always be successfully slashed
  • 10 random, free runes from Lundail once per day

Wilderness sword 2 only[edit | edit source]

  • Faster log cutting from Ents
  • 20% off entry cost to the Resource Area
  • Access to a shortcut in the Deep Wilderness Dungeon
  • Can have up to 4 ecumenical keys at a time
  • 10 additional random, free runes from Lundail once per day, resulting 20 per day

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
22 September 2021
(update)

Wilderness swords can now slash webs whilst in the player's inventory.

24 March 2016
(update | poll)
  • It is now also possible to get multiple copies of achievement diary equipment by talking to relevant diary masters or by talking to Perdu, found upstairs in the Edgeville general store. Perdu will charge a small fee.
  • The "Destroy" option was replaced with a "Drop" option.
25 June 2015
(update | poll)

Wilderness swords now have a 100% success rate when slashing webs.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The sword's design is based on the macuahuitl, a wooden sword with obsidian blades that was used by different civilisations in Mesoamerica, such as the Aztecs.

[[File:Wilderness sword 2 detail.png|left|150px]]
The '''wilderness sword 2''' is an [[Achievement Diary]] reward for completing the [[medium Wilderness Diary]] given by the [[Lesser Fanatic]] in [[Edgeville]] and can be reclaimed from him for free if lost.

Its stats are identical to a [[steel sword]].

|astab = +11
|aslash = +8

|arange = 0

==Combat styles==
{{CombatStyles|Stab Sword}}

==Benefits==
===From Wilderness sword 1===
* [[Deserted Keep|Wilderness lever]] will teleport to either [[Edgeville]] or [[Ardougne]]
* Webs will always be successfully slashed
* 10 random, free [[runes]] from [[Lundail]] once per day

===Wilderness sword 2 only===
* Faster log cutting from [[Ent]]s
* 20% off entry cost to the [[Resource Area]]
* Access to a [[shortcut]] in the [[Deep Wilderness Dungeon]]
* Can have up to 4 [[ecumenical key]]s at a time
*10 additional random, free [[runes]] from [[Lundail]] once per day, resulting 20 per day

==Changes==
{{Subject changes header}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 22 September 2021
|update = Wilderness & Equipment Rebalance Changes
|poll =
|change = Wilderness swords can now slash webs whilst in the player's inventory.
}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 24 March 2016
|update = White & Black Graceful
|poll = Old School Content Poll 40: Vanilla LootShare & QoL
|change = *It is now also possible to get multiple copies of achievement diary equipment by talking to relevant diary masters or by talking to Perdu, found upstairs in the Edgeville general store. Perdu will charge a small fee.
*The "Destroy" option was replaced with a "Drop" option.
}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 25 June 2015
|update = Boss Room Counters & Platinum Tokens
|poll = Old School Content Poll 34: XP droplets & Slayer
|change = Wilderness swords now have a 100% success rate when slashing webs. 
}}
{{Subject changes footer}}

==Trivia==
* The sword's design is based on the {{WP|macuahuitl}}, a wooden sword with obsidian blades that was used by different civilisations in Mesoamerica, such as the Aztecs.
